personal.name: Hammad Tahir
personal.title: Full Stack Developer
personal.about: I'm a passionate Full Stack Developer with expertise in modern web technologies. I specialize in building scalable applications using React, Next.js, Node.js, and various other technologies. With experience in both frontend and backend development, I enjoy creating seamless user experiences and robust server-side solutions.
personal.summary: Experienced Full Stack Developer with 5+ years of expertise in React, Next.js, Node.js, Laravel, and React Native. Passionate about creating innovative solutions and delivering high-quality applications.

experience.title: Senior Full Stack Developer
experience.description: Led development of multiple web applications using React, Next.js, and Node.js. Implemented CI/CD pipelines and managed cloud infrastructure.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.description: Developed and maintained web applications using Laravel, Vue.js, and React Native. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver features.

experience.title: Frontend Developer
experience.description: Built responsive websites and web applications using React and modern CSS frameworks. Optimized performance and user experience.

education.description: Focused on software engineering and web development
